name: Skeleton Key (Wes Does, Pat)
description:
Make your way through the tunnels and dungeon, using clues to determine which keys to use to find your way out.

Controls

    Controller:
  • Joysticks - Move/Camera
  • B - Open Keyring
  • A - Try Key
  • X - Crouch
  • RT - Zoom
  • RB - Jump
  • LT - Sprint
    Keyboard/Mouse:
  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Camera
  • Tab - Open Keyring
  • E - Try Key
  • C - Crouch
  • Right-click - Zoom
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Sprint

Credits

  • Pat Farnach - Programming, Modeling, Animation
  • Sandra Lanz - Textures, Art, Puzzle Design
  • Wesley Mueller - Level Design, Modeling, Music, Sound
